description: This file contains SQL statements for setting up a 'player_stats' table for a Tic Tac Toe game, including table creation, a trigger function for timestamp updates, trigger setup, Row Level Security (RLS) options, and optional RPC function definitions.

methods.name: public.set_updated_at
methods.description: A trigger function that updates the 'updated_at' timestamp for a row before any update.

methods.name: public.run_sql
methods.description: An optional helper RPC function for executing arbitrary SQL commands, restricted to SERVICE ROLE for automation purposes.
